```{r}
library(e1071)
library(arules)
data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jhackmeister/ALY6040/refs/heads/main/Final%20Project/final_project_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
str(data)
```

```{r}
# Cleaning
data <- subset(data, select = -X)
data$PCOS_diag <- as.factor(data$PCOS_diag)
data$Men_Irrg <- as.factor(data$Men_Irrg)
write.csv(data, "final_project_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
any_na <- apply(data, 2, function(x) any(is.na(x)))
print(any_na)

any_nan <- apply(data, 2, function(x) any(is.nan(x)))
print(any_nan)

any_inf <- apply(data, 2, function(x) any(is.infinite(x)))
print(any_inf)
```

```{r}
x <- subset(data, select = -PCOS_diag)
y <- data$PCOS_diag
model <- svm(x, y)
```

```{r}
pred <- fitted(model)

# Check accuracy:
table(pred, y)
```
